Title: The Nightmare Man (2)
Plot: With Luke, Clyde and Rani trapped in a bizarre dreamscape, Sarah Jane must fight alone. As the Nightmare Man grows stronger, only K-9 might hold the key. But can Luke summon the courage to face his adult life before the whole world is trapped in an endless nightmare?
GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Doon Mackichan, Paul Kasey, Toby Longworth
